trans-unit.source: Returns Serial Number of a drive.

seg-source.mrk: Returns Serial Number of a drive.

target.mrk: Returns Serial Number of a drive.

trans-unit.source: Path of drive to receive information from.

seg-source.mrk: Path of drive to receive information from.

target.mrk: Path of drive to receive information from.

trans-unit.source: the Serial Number of the drive as a string.

seg-source.mrk: the Serial Number of the drive as a string.

target.mrk: the Serial Number of the drive as a string.

trans-unit.source: The value returned is not the hardware serial number as found on the label of the drive, it is the Windows Volume ID for the drive.

seg-source.mrk: The value returned is not the hardware serial number as found on the label of the drive, it is the Windows Volume ID for the drive.

target.mrk: The value returned is not the hardware serial number as found on the label of the drive, it is the Windows Volume ID for the drive.

trans-unit.source: Find the serial number of the home drive, generally this is the C:\ drive.

seg-source.mrk: Find the serial number of the home drive, generally this is the C:\ drive.

target.mrk: Find the serial number of the home drive, generally this is the C:\ drive.
